content: Chapter 2 has a lot more secrets to uncover, including another hidden area that opens up after finishing a side quest and some Key Items that will help you reach missable bosses.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secrets'.
The content is as follows:
Chapter 2 has a lot more secrets to uncover, including another hidden area that opens up after finishing a side quest and some Key Items that will help you reach missable bosses.
